description: Class that represents a mix of products or single product.

mixSequence.description: The order of this product in the mix

percent.description: The proportion that this product composes of the mix. Can be calculated from Wt/Vol or other measures.

product.description: Defines a product that is a component of the mix.

quantity.description: The quantity of this product which is included in the mix. You should additionally calculate percent if feasible.
